EcmaScript6 Examples - array - find

Set is a new data structure, but is possible to compare with array. The most important characteristic of Set is that it doesn't accept duplicated value.

Let's see an example: 

                
                    let set1 = new Set();
                    set1.add(1);
                    set1.add(1);
                    set1.add(2);
                    set1.add(3);
                    console.log(set1.size); //=> 3

                    set1.delete(1);
                    console.log(set1.size); //=> 2

                    set1.add(2);
                    console.log(set1.size); //=> 2

                    set1.clear();
                    console.log(set1.size); //=> 0

In the example, first test try add twice the number 1, but only one number 1 is added. After is tried to add a new number 2, but it isn't allowed.
